      • readFromFile

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Reads text lines from file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file.
        Returns:
        Returns list of strings from given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception when there was an error while reading file.

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Writes text lines to file.
        Parameters:
        lines - List of strings which should be saved in given file.
        fileName - Name of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception when there was an error while writing text into file.

      • eraseFile

        public static void eraseFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes all the file content. File is not being deleted.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception when there was an error while deleting file content.
